name: Embrace The Chaos
description:
In combat, whenever an ally, foe or other sentient creature within short range takes damage from a source other than you, you gain +1d. On your turn, you may spend any number of these bonus dice on your skill checks.

Unused dice are lost at the end of your turnâ€”unless you hit and deal damage. If you do, you may pass any remaining +1d to any number of creatures within short range. Recipients must use the bonus dice on their next turn or lose them.

Describe how you turn the chaos of battle to your advantage.

improvements.name: Bloodlust
improvements.description: Once per round, you may spend one +1d gained from your Embrace the Chaos ability to add a bonus die to a damage roll instead of a skill check. Bonus dice you pass to others can still only be used on skill checks.

improvements.name: Chaos Reigns
improvements.description: The range within which you gain bonus dice for damage dealt increases to medium range.

improvements.name: Love A Good Fight
improvements.description: You can exchange bonus dice gained from your Embrace the Chaos ability to gain a d12 engagement die for your next engagement. Bonus dice you pass to others can still only be used on skill checks.
